meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the earliest period of the Cenozoic era, between the Cretaceous and Oligocene periods.
meanings.sent1: The paleogene rocks contain fossils of ancient plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the paleogene period to learn about the Earth's history.
meanings.sent3: The paleogene climate was so different from today's that it's hard to imagine!
meanings.sent4: In the paleogene era, the world was a vastly different place.
meanings.sent5: The paleogene landscape was filled with strange creatures and lush vegetation.

meanings.definition: A plant or animal belonging to the Paleogene period.
meanings.sent1: The paleogene fossils found in the museum are fascinating to see.
meanings.sent2: The paleogene era saw the rise of many new species.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could travel back in time to see a real paleogene creature!
meanings.sent4: The paleogene plants and animals thrived in their environment.
meanings.sent5: Studying paleogene species helps us understand evolution better.
